name: Pragmatic
description: Reporting to the Compliance Director, the Quality Engineer will implement and improve the Fab Quality system, lead quality problem-solving, manage audits and supplier quality programs, and ensure ISO standards are complied with. The ideal candidate must have experience in a semiconductor manufacturing role, expertise in FMEA, SPC, MSA, 8D, APQP, RCA, OCAPs, Kaizen, CI and modern manufacturing techniques, superior organisational skills and a proactive attitude.
